TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolTip extends System.ComponentModel.Component implements class System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider
Public Class ToolTip Inherits Component Implements IExtenderProvider
public ref class ToolTip : System::ComponentModel::Component, System::ComponentModel::IExtenderProvider

summary.span: 表示一个长方形的小弹出窗口，该窗口在用户将指针悬停在一个控件上时显示有关该控件用途的简短说明。

span.span: Represents a small rectangular pop-up window that displays a brief description of a control's purpose when the user rests the pointer on the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与类，你可以向提供提示用户时用户将指针放在控件上。With the class, you can provide hints to a user when the user places the pointer on a control. 类通常使用来提醒用户控件的预期用途。The class is typically used to alert users to the intended use of a control. 例如，可以指定工具提示文本接受一个名称，指定要在控件中键入的名称的格式的控件。For example, you can specify ToolTip text for a control that accepts a name, specifying the format of the name to be typed into the control. 除了提供提示，你可以使用类以提供运行的时状态信息。In addition to providing hints, you can also use the class to provide run time status information. 例如，你可以使用类来显示连接速度和行质量数据，当用户将指针压入显示 Internet 连接状态的控件。For example, you can use the class to display connection speed and line quality data when the user moves the pointer onto a control that displays Internet connection status. 类可以在任何容器中使用。The class can be used in any container. 若要显式指定一个容器，使用构造函数。To explicitly specify a container, use the constructor. 单个组件通常用于为在单个窗体上的多个控件创建工具提示。A single component typically is used to create ToolTips for multiple controls on a single form. 在创建后，使用单独调用方法将关联到的单个控件的工具提示显示文本。After you create a , use a separate call to the method to associate ToolTip display text to an individual control. 当用户将指针在控件上，则显示工具提示，其文本。Then when the user moves the pointer on a control, the ToolTip with its text is displayed. 你可以调用为相同的控件来更改与控件关联的文本多次。You can call more than once for the same control to change the text that is associated with the control. 若要获取与控件关联的文本，请使用方法。To get the text that is associated with a control, use the method. 若要删除的实例的所有工具提示文本关联类，而使用方法。To remove all ToolTip text associations with an instance of the class, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 不显示已禁用的控件的工具提示文本。ToolTip text is not displayed for controls that are disabled. 除非属性设置为`true`，其容器处于非活动状态时，不显示工具提示。Unless the property is set to `true`, ToolTips are not displayed when their container is inactive. 类提供下列属性和方法，以便修改的默认行为和工具提示的外观。The class provides the following properties and methods to modify the default behavior and appearance of a ToolTip. |类别Category|关联的成员Associated members| |--------------|------------------------| |手动显示Manual display|, , , , , , , , , , | |工具提示计时ToolTip timing|, , , , , , , , | |内容Content|, , , , , , , , , , | |外观Appearance|, , , , , , , , , , | 如果你想要禁用所有工具提示文本，以便它不能在你的应用程序中显示，则可以使用属性。If you want to disable all ToolTip text so that it cannot be displayed in your application, you can use the property. 通常由操作系统，但自定义的外观的绘制工具提示，你可以设置属性`true`并处理事件。Usually the ToolTip is drawn by the operating system, but to customize the appearance of the , you can set the property to `true` and handle the event. 类实现接口，具有一个方法，该接口。The class implements the interface, which has a single method, . 工具提示在设计时，扩展相同的窗体上控件添加`ToolTip`属性。ToolTips extend controls on the same form at design time, adding a `ToolTip` property. 有关扩展程序提供程序的详细信息，请参阅[扩展程序提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ce043d8-cd48-49dd-abef-185a2079e96a)。For more information about extender providers, see [Extender Providers](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ce043d8-cd48-49dd-abef-185a2079e96a). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的实例类并将与实例关联在创建实例。The following code example creates an instance of the class and associates the instance with the that the instance is created within. 代码随后初始化延迟属性， ，和。The code then initializes the delay properties , , and . 此外实例类集属性`true`启用工具提示文本为始终显示，而不考虑该窗体是否处于活动状态。In addition the instance of the class sets the property to `true` to enable ToolTip text to always be display regardless of whether the form is active. 最后，该示例将工具提示文本与窗体上的两个控件相关联和。Finally, the example associates ToolTip text with two controls on a form, a and a . 该代码示例要求在示例中定义的方法是位于包含控件名为`button1`和控件名为`checkBox1`，和从构造函数中调用方法，。The code example requires that the method defined in the example is located within a that contains a control named `button1` and a control named `checkBox1`, and that the method is called from the constructor of the . [!code-cpp[ToolTip Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolTip Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolTip Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolTip Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolTip Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolTip Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

[!code-cpp[ToolTip Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolTip Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolTip Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolTip Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolTip Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolTip Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数，可将相关联与任意对象。The constructor enables you to associate a with any object. 通过将相关联这种方式，你的控件移交到工具提示的生存期。By associating the in this manner, you hand over control of the lifetime of the ToolTip to the . 如果你在你的应用程序中使用多个组件，并想要同时释放所有这些，这会很有用。This can be useful if you use several components in your application, and want to dispose of all of them at the same time. 例如，如果您将相关联、 ，和一个与，则调用上也会强制释放所有这些组件。For example, if you associate a , an , and a with a , calling on the will also force disposal of all of these components.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Active { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指示工具提示当前是否活动。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ToolTip is currently active.

value.span: 如果工具提示当前处于活动状态，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the ToolTip is currently active; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与属性，你可以启用或禁用具有指定此特定的文本的所有控件的工具提示文本的显示组件。With the property, you can enable or disable the display of ToolTip text for all controls that have text specified by this particular component. 虽然多个可以创建组件，并将其分配给窗体中，设置属性`false`仅影响当前。Although more than one component can be created and assigned to a form, setting the property to `false` only affects the current . 你可以使用户能够在窗体提供应用程序的选项中设置此属性的值。You can enable users to set the value of this property in a form that provides application options. 这些选项，反过来，向用户提供启用或禁用在你的应用程序中的工具提示显示的功能。These options, in turn, provide the user with the ability to enable or disable the display of ToolTips in your application.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int AutomaticDelay { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置工具提示的自动延迟。

span.span: Gets or sets the automatic delay for the ToolTip.

value.span: 自动延迟（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: The automatic delay, in milliseconds.
The default is 500.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够设置单个延迟值，然后将其用于将设置的值， ，和属性。The property enables you to set a single delay value, which is then used to set the values of the , , and properties. 每次属性设置，则默认情况下设置下列值。Each time the property is set, the following values are set by default. |PropertyProperty|默认值Default Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||10 次属性值。10 times the property value.| ||等于属性值。Equal to the property value.| ||1/5 之属性值。1/5 of the property value.| 此外可以独立地一次设置这些属性设置属性。These properties can also be set independently once the property has been set. 有关详细信息，请参阅， ，和属性。For more information, see the , , and properties. 此属性通常用于你的工具提示窗口提供一致的延迟模式。This property is typically used to provide a consistent delay pattern for your ToolTip windows.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int AutoPopDelay { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置当指针在具有指定工具提示文本的控件内保持静止时，工具提示保持可见的时间期限。

span.span: Gets or sets the period of time the ToolTip remains visible if the pointer is stationary on a control with specified ToolTip text.

value.span: 当指针在控件上保持静止时， 保持可见的时间期限（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: The period of time, in milliseconds, that the remains visible when the pointer is stationary on a control.
The default value is 5000.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够缩短或延长时间的当指针在控件上时显示窗口。The property enables you to shorten or lengthen the time that the window is displayed when the pointer is on a control. 例如，如果你在工具提示窗口中显示了广泛的帮助，则可以增加此属性，以确保用户具有足够的时间来阅读文本的值。For example, if you display extensive Help in a ToolTip window, you can increase the value of this property to ensure that the user has sufficient time to read the text. 如果你想要具有工具提示窗口的一致的延迟模式，则可以设置属性。If you want to have a consistent delay pattern for your ToolTip windows, you can set the property. 属性集， ，和为初始值属性基于单个值。The property sets the , , and properties to initial values based on a single value. 每次设置属性，属性设置为 10 次属性值。Every time the property is set, the property is set to 10 times the property value. 一次属性设置，你可以单独设置属性，重写默认值。Once the property is set, you can independently set the property, overriding the default value. 可延迟弹出窗口的最长时间为 5000 毫秒。The maximum time you can delay a popup is 5000 milliseconds. 对于较长的持续时间，使用方法可控制显示工具提示时确切的时间。For longer durations, use the method to control the exact moment when the ToolTip is displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的实例类并将与实例关联在创建实例。The following code example creates an instance of the class and associates the instance with the that the instance is created within. 代码随后初始化延迟属性， ，和。The code then initializes the delay properties , , and . 此外实例类集属性`true`以便无论是否处于活动状态窗体显示工具提示文本。In addition the instance of the class sets the property to `true` to enable ToolTip text to be displayed regardless of whether the form is active. 最后，该示例将工具提示文本与窗体上的两个控件相关联和。Finally, the example associates ToolTip text with two controls on a form, a and a . 该代码示例要求在示例中定义的方法是位于包含控件名为`button1`和控件名为`checkBox1,`和从的构造函数中调用方法，。The code example requires that the method defined in the example is located within a that contains a control named `button1` and a control named `checkBox1,` and that the method is called from the constructor of the . [!code-cpp[ToolTip Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolTip Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolTip Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolTip Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolTip Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolTip Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工具提示是所有者绘制，除非将忽略此属性。Unless the ToolTip is owner-drawn, this property is ignored. 系统默认字体会自动使用，并且只能重写通过自行绘制工具提示。The system default font is automatically used and can only be overridden by owner-drawing the ToolTip. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包装标准 Windows 控件类或设置不提供的样式时，才应扩展属性命名空间。The property should only be extended when you are wrapping a standard Windows control class or to set styles not provided by the namespace. 有关创建控制参数的详细信息，请参阅`CreateWindow`和`CreateWindowEx`函数和`CREATESTRUCT`Windows 平台 SDK 参考中的结构文档位于 MSDN 库中。For more information about creating control parameters, see the `CreateWindow` and `CreateWindowEx` functions and the `CREATESTRUCT` structure documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN Library. > [!NOTE] > 在重写属性在派生类中，使用基类的属性来扩展的基实现。When overriding the property in a derived class, use the base class's property to extend the base implementation.

span.span: Occurs when the ToolTip is drawn and the property is set to and the property is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与事件，你可以自定义的外观。With the event, you can customize the appearance of the . 事件由引发类时绘制和属性值是`true`和属性是`false`。The event is raised by the class when the is drawn and the property value is `true` and the property is `false`. 类包含绘制所需的所有信息，包括工具提示文本， ，和对象上完成绘制。The class contains all the information needed to paint the , including the ToolTip text, the , and the object on which the drawing should be done. 若要自定义工具提示的外观，使用来确定的工具提示，边界和对象来执行自定义的绘制。To customize the look of the ToolTip, use the to determine the bounds of the ToolTip, and the object to perform your customized drawing. 你可以增加的边界显示通过处理之前事件。You can increase the bounds of the before it is shown by handling the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何自定义绘图。The following code example demonstrates how to custom draw the . 该示例创建并将其关联到三个控件位于。The example creates a and associates it to three controls located on the . 该示例设置属性`true`并处理事件。The example sets the property to `true` and handles the event. 在事件处理程序，是自定义绘制不同，具体取决于什么按钮所述为其显示的属性。In the event handler, the is custom drawn differently, depending on what button the is being displayed for as indicated by the property. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 在垃圾回收器回收 之前，释放非托管资源并执行其他清理操作。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the is reclaimed by the garbage collector.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写 。This method overrides . 应用程序代码不应调用此方法。对象的方法过程中将自动调用垃圾回收，除非已通过调用禁用垃圾回收器的终止方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Finalize 方法和析构函数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70)，[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用和属性以修改由工具提示的配色方案。Use the and properties to modify the color scheme used by ToolTips. 系统默认字体会自动使用，并且只能重写通过自行绘制工具提示。The system default font is automatically used and can only be overridden by owner-drawing the ToolTip. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与方法，你可以检索任何控件的工具提示文本。With the method, you can retrieve the ToolTip text for any control. 如果工具提示文本动态更改应用程序中，你可以使用此方法以找出在任何时刻，具体取决于应用程序的状态显示的文本。If the ToolTip text changes dynamically in an application, you can use this method to find out what text is displayed at any point, depending on the state of the application. 若要更改控件显示的文本，请使用方法。To change the text that a control is displaying, use the method.

param.name: win
param.span: 与工具提示相关联的关联窗口或控件的 。

summary.span: 隐藏指定的工具提示窗口。

span.span: Hides the specified ToolTip window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法隐藏指定的工具提示如果当前显示。The method hides the ToolTip for the specified if it is currently being displayed. 不禁用或其他方式阻止在将来显示相同的工具提示。It does not disable or otherwise prevent the same ToolTip from being displayed in the future. 若要改为禁用所有与当前关联的工具提示窗口组件，设置属性`false`。To instead disable all ToolTip windows associated with the current component, set the property to `false`. 在部分信任环境中运行的应用程序必须声明权限才能使用此方法，因为可以隐藏独立于用户执行任何操作的提示。Applications running in partial trust must assert the permission to use this method, as can hide the tip independent of user action.

span.span: is .
Requires permission.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int InitialDelay { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置工具提示显示之前经过的时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the time that passes before the ToolTip appears.

value.span: 工具提示窗口显示之前，指针必须在控件上保持静止的时间期限（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: The period of time, in milliseconds, that the pointer must remain stationary on a control before the ToolTip window is displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与属性，您可以缩短或延长时间的显示工具提示窗口前等待。With the property, you can shorten or lengthen the time that the waits before displaying a ToolTip window. 如果值属性设置为一个值，持续时间太长，你的应用程序的用户可能不知道你的应用程序提供工具提示帮助。If the value of the property is set to a value that is too long in duration, the user of your application might not know that your application provides ToolTip Help. 此属性可用于确保用户具有工具提示显示快速缩短指定的时间。You can use this property to ensure that the user has ToolTips displayed quickly by shortening the time specified. 此属性的值不能超过 32767。The value for this property cannot exceed 32767. 如果你想要具有工具提示窗口的一致的延迟模式，则可以设置属性。If you want to have a consistent delay pattern for your ToolTip windows, you can set the property. 属性集， ，和为初始值属性基于一次值。The property sets the , , and properties to initial values based on a single time value. 每次设置属性，属性设置为相同的值属性。Every time the property is set, the property is set to the same value as the property. 一次属性设置，你可以单独设置属性，重写默认值。Once the property is set, you can independently set the property, overriding the default value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的实例类并将与实例关联在创建实例。The following code example creates an instance of the class and associates the instance with the that the instance is created within. 代码随后初始化延迟属性， ，和。The code then initializes the delay properties , , and . 此外实例类集属性`true`以便无论是否处于活动状态窗体显示工具提示文本。In addition the instance of the class sets the property to `true` to enable ToolTip text to be displayed regardless of whether the form is active. 最后，该示例将工具提示文本与窗体上的两个控件相关联和。Finally, the example associates ToolTip text with two controls on a form, a and a . 该代码示例要求在示例中定义的方法是位于包含控件名为`button1`和控件名为`checkBox1,`和从的构造函数中调用方法，。The code example requires that the method defined in the example is located within a that contains a control named `button1` and a control named `checkBox1,` and that the method is called from the constructor of the . [!code-cpp[ToolTip Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolTip Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolTip Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolTip Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolTip Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolTip Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsBalloon { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示工具提示是否应使用气球状窗口的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ToolTip should use a balloon window.

value.span: 如果应使用气球状窗口，则为 ；如果应使用标准矩形窗口，则为 。

span.span: if a balloon window should be used; otherwise, if a standard rectangular window should be used.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，使用裸机矩形窗口显示工具提示。By default, ToolTips are displayed using bare rectangular windows. 通过设置属性`true`，将使用气球状窗口显示工具提示。By setting the property to `true`, the ToolTip will be displayed using a balloon window.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool OwnerDraw { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示工具提示是由操作系统绘制还是由你提供的代码绘制。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ToolTip is drawn by the operating system or by code that you provide.

value.span: 如果 由您提供的代码绘制，则为 ；如果 由操作系统绘制，则为 。

span.span: if the is drawn by code that you provide; if the is drawn by the operating system.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，由操作系统，但自定义的外观的绘制可以设置属性`true`并处理事件。Usually, a is drawn by the operating system, but to customize the appearance of the you can set the property to `true` and handle the event. 属性优先于属性。The property takes precedence over the property. 如果两者都设置为`true`、将显示使用气球状窗口而不是所有者绘制的窗口。If both are set to `true`, the will be displayed using a balloon window rather than an owner drawn window. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何到所有者绘制。The following code example demonstrates how to owner draw the . 该示例创建并将其关联到三个控件位于。The example creates a and associates it to three controls located on the . 该示例设置属性`true`并处理事件。The example sets the property to `true` and handles the event. 在事件处理程序，是自定义绘制以不同的方式取决于什么按钮所述为其显示的属性。In the event handler, the is custom drawn differently depending upon what button the is being displayed for as indicated by the property. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Popup As PopupEventHandler

summary.span: 在工具提示最初显示之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before a ToolTip is initially displayed.

summary.span: 这是 类的默认事件。

span.span: This is the default event for the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时显示的工具提示，将引发事件通过显式调用其中一个方法时，或者当类隐式将显示工具提示。The event is raised whenever a ToolTip is displayed, either through an explicit call to one of the methods or when the class implicitly displays a ToolTip. 可以取消此事件。This event can be canceled. 调用此事件中的属性，导致无法重新创建，如的基础窗口句柄，将导致引发异常。Calling properties in this event that cause the underlying window handle to be recreated, such as , will result in an exception being thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ToolTip1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolTip1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#619](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#619)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#619](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#619)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveAll() cil managed

summary.span: 移除当前与工具提示组件关联的所有工具提示文本。

span.span: Removes all ToolTip text currently associated with the ToolTip component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此方法删除与关联的所有工具提示文本组件的所有关联的控件。You can use this method to remove all ToolTip text that is associated with the component for all associated controls. 若要改为禁用的文本显示，请使用属性。To disable the display of text instead, use the property. 若要更改单个关联控件的文本，请使用方法。To change the text for a single associated control, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ReshowDelay { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置指针从一个控件移到另一控件时，必须经过多长时间才会出现后面的工具提示窗口。

span.span: Gets or sets the length of time that must transpire before subsequent ToolTip windows appear as the pointer moves from one control to another.

value.span: 显示后续工具提示窗口所需要的时间（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: The length of time, in milliseconds, that it takes subsequent ToolTip windows to appear.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与属性，您可以缩短或延长时间的等待上一个工具提示窗口显示后显示工具提示窗口。With the property, you can shorten or lengthen the time that the waits before displaying a ToolTip window after a previous ToolTip window is displayed. 将显示一个工具提示窗口，第一次的值属性用于确定应用在最初显示工具提示窗口之前的延迟。The first time a ToolTip window is displayed, the value of the property is used to determine the delay to apply before initially showing the ToolTip window. 当当前正显示工具提示窗口和用户将指针移到另一个显示工具提示窗口中的值的控件显示新的控件的工具提示之前使用属性。When a ToolTip window is currently being displayed and the user moves the pointer to another control that displays a ToolTip window, the value of the property is used before showing the ToolTip for the new control. 中的上一个控件的工具提示窗口必须仍显示顺序中指定的延迟属性; 否则为使用属性值。The ToolTip window from the previous control must still be displayed in order for the delay specified in the property to be used; otherwise the property value is used. 如果你想要具有工具提示窗口的一致的延迟模式，则可以设置属性。If you want to have a consistent delay pattern for ToolTip windows, you can set the property. 属性集， ，和为初始值属性基于一次值。The property sets the , , and properties to initial values based on a single time value. 每次设置属性，属性设置为 1/5 之属性值。Every time the property is set, the property is set to 1/5 of the property value. 一次属性设置，你可以单独设置属性，重写默认值。Once the property is set, you can independently set the property, overriding the default value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的实例类并将与实例关联在创建实例。The following code example creates an instance of the class and associates the instance with the that the instance is created within. 代码随后初始化延迟属性， ，和。The code then initializes the delay properties , , and . 此外实例类集属性`true`以便无论是否处于活动状态窗体显示工具提示文本。In addition the instance of the class sets the property to `true` to enable ToolTip text to be displayed regardless of whether the form is active. 最后，该示例将工具提示文本与窗体上的两个控件相关联和。Finally, the example associates ToolTip text with two controls on a form, a and a . 该代码示例要求在示例中定义的方法是位于包含控件名为`button1`和控件名为`checkBox1,`和从的构造函数中调用方法，。The code example requires that the method defined in the example is located within a that contains a control named `button1` and a control named `checkBox1,` and that the method is called from the constructor of the . [!code-cpp[ToolTip Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolTip Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolTip Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolTip Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolTip Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolTip Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使工具提示文本与指定的控件相关联。

span.span: Associates ToolTip text with the specified control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了指定要显示的控件的工具提示文本，你还可以使用此方法以修改控件的工具提示文本。In addition to specifying the ToolTip text to display for a control, you can also use this method to modify the ToolTip text for a control. 调用方法一次以上的给定控件未指定要显示的控件的多个工具提示文本，而只会更改控件的当前工具提示文本。Calling the method more than once for a given control does not specify multiple ToolTip text to display for a control, but instead changes the current ToolTip text for the control. 若要确定在运行时与控件关联的工具提示文本，请使用方法。To determine the ToolTip text that is associated with a control at run time, use the method. 作为一般规则所用文本应很短。但是，可以通过插入分行符`\r\n`转义字符序列。As a general rule the text used should be short; however, you can insert line breaks by using the `\r\n` escape character sequence. & 号 (&) 在文本中处理如下所述属性。Ampersands (&) in the text are handled as described by the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的实例类并将与实例关联在创建实例。The following code example creates an instance of the class and associates the instance with the that the instance is created within. 代码随后初始化延迟属性， ，和。The code then initializes the delay properties , , and . 此外实例类集属性`true`以便无论是否处于活动状态窗体显示工具提示文本。In addition the instance of the class sets the property to `true` to enable ToolTip text to be displayed regardless of whether the form is active. 最后，该示例将工具提示文本与窗体上的两个控件相关联和。Finally, the example associates ToolTip text with two controls on a form, a and a . 此示例需要在示例中定义的方法是位于包含控件名为`button1`和控件名为`checkBox1`，和从的构造函数中调用方法，。This example requires that the method defined in the example is located within a that contains a control named `button1` and a control named `checkBox1`, and that the method is called from the constructor of the . [!code-cpp[ToolTip Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolTip Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolTip Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolTip Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolTip Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolTip Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

Public Sub Show (text As String, window As IWin32Window)
public: void Show(System::String ^ text, System::Windows::Forms::IWin32Window ^ window);

param.name: text
param.span: 包含新工具提示文本的 。

param.name: window
param.span: 要为其显示工具提示的 。

summary.span: 设置与指定控件关联的工具提示文本，然后以模式方式显示工具提示。

span.span: Sets the ToolTip text associated with the specified control, and displays the ToolTip modally.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版本方法以模式方式显示工具提示为指定的控件; 即，工具提示将显示，直到方法调用，或直到父窗体最小化，隐藏，或关闭。The version of the method displays the ToolTip for the specified control modally; that is, the ToolTip will be displayed until the method is called, or until the parent form is minimized, hidden, or closed. 在关联控件的中心来放置工具提示。The ToolTip is positioned in the center of the associated control. 在部分信任环境中运行的应用程序必须声明权限才能使用此方法，因为可以控制的显示和独立于用户执行任何操作的工具提示的位置。Applications running in partial trust must assert the permission to use this method, as can control the display and location of a ToolTip independent of user action.

span.span: The parameter is .
Requires permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `pt`参数可指定超出界限位置关联的控件、 其父窗体中，或甚至是桌面。The `pt` parameter can specify a position outside the bounds of the associated control, its parent form, or even the desktop. 版本方法以模式方式显示工具提示为指定的控件; 即，工具提示将显示，直到方法调用，或直到父窗体最小化，隐藏，或关闭。The version of the method displays the ToolTip for the specified control modally; that is, the ToolTip will be displayed until the method is called, or until the parent form is minimized, hidden, or dismissed. 在部分信任环境中运行的应用程序必须声明权限才能使用此方法，因为可以控制的显示和独立于用户执行任何操作的工具提示的位置。Applications running in partial trust must assert the permission to use this method, as can control the display and location of a ToolTip independent of user action.

summary.span: 设置与指定控件关联的工具提示文本，然后在指定的相对位置以模式方式显示该工具提示。

span.span: Sets the ToolTip text associated with the specified control, and then displays the ToolTip modally at the specified relative position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此版本的重载方法完全相同的操作版本，只不过独立的 x 坐标和 y 坐标而不是指定偏移量。This version of the overloaded method operates identically to the version, except that the offset is specified as separate x- and y-coordinates instead of a . 在部分信任环境中运行的应用程序必须声明权限才能使用此方法，因为可以控制的显示和独立于用户执行任何操作的工具提示的位置。Applications running in partial trust must assert the permission to use this method, as can control the display and location of a ToolTip independent of user action.

span.span: Requires permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此版本的重载方法完全相同的操作版本，只不过偏移量指定作为单独 x 和 y 坐标而不是。This version of the overloaded method operates identically to the version, except that the offset is specified as separate x and y coordinates instead of a . 若要以模式方式显示工具提示，请调用改为重载版本的此方法。To display the ToolTip modally, call the overloaded version of this method instead. 在部分信任环境中运行的应用程序必须声明权限才能使用此方法，因为可以控制的显示和独立于用户执行任何操作的工具提示的位置。Applications running in partial trust must assert the permission to use this method, as can control the display and location of a ToolTip independent of user action.

is less than or equal to 0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowAlways { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否显示工具提示窗口，甚至是在其父控件不活动的时候。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a ToolTip window is displayed, even when its parent control is not active.

value.span: 如果始终显示工具提示，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the ToolTip is always displayed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与属性，可以显示工具提示窗口，即使的容器处于非活动状态。With the property, you can display a ToolTip window even when the container of the is not active. 可以使用此功能在无模式窗口应用程序以启用要显示的工具提示窗口而不考虑的无模式窗口处于活动状态。You can use this feature in a modeless window application to enable ToolTip windows to be displayed regardless of which modeless window is active. 当你想要通过使用创建的控件时，此功能也是有用，其中包含多个在其中显示工具提示窗口的控件。This feature is also useful when you want to create a control by using the , which contains a number of controls within it that display ToolTip windows. 因为通常不是活动窗口在窗体中，将此属性设置为上的`true`使控件内的要在任何时显示工具提示窗口。Because the is often not the active window on a form, setting this property to `true` enables the controls within the to display ToolTip windows at any time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的实例类并将与实例关联在创建实例。The following code example creates an instance of the class and associates the instance with the that the instance is created within. 代码随后初始化延迟属性， ，和。The code then initializes the delay properties , , and . 此外实例类集属性`true`以便无论是否处于活动状态窗体显示工具提示文本。In addition the instance of the class sets the property to `true` to enable ToolTip text to be displayed regardless of whether the form is active. 最后，该示例将工具提示文本与窗体上的两个控件相关联和。Finally, the example associates ToolTip text with two controls on a form, a and a . 该代码示例要求在示例中定义的方法是位于包含控件名为`button1`和控件名为`checkBox1`，和从构造函数中调用方法，。The code example requires that the method defined in the example is located within a that contains a control named `button1` and a control named `checkBox1`, and that the method is called from the constructor of the . [!code-cpp[ToolTip Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolTip Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolTip Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolTip Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolTip Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolTip Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void StopTimer() cil managed

summary.span: 停止用于隐藏所显示工具提示的计时器。

span.span: Stops the timer that hides displayed ToolTips.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类具有内部计时器，使用它来设置工具提示显示持续时间。The class has an internal timer that it uses to set the display duration for ToolTips. 通过设置与此计时器关联的持续时间属性。The duration associated with this timer is set through the property. 方法，将停止导致任何显示的工具提示，直到有模式地显示此内部计时器调用方法时，或最小化、 隐藏，或关闭了父窗体。The method will stop this internal timer, causing any displayed ToolTip to be shown modally until the method is called, or the parent form is minimized, hidden, or closed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool StripAmpersands { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定如何处理 &。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines how ampersand (&) characters are treated.

value.span: 如果 & 字符被剥离从工具提示的文本;否则为。

span.span: if ampersand characters are stripped from the ToolTip text; otherwise, .
The default is false.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序通常用于多种用途，如菜单项和工具提示中使用的相同的字符串资源。An application commonly uses the same string resource for multiple purposes, such as a menu item and a ToolTip. 但是，菜单通常启用加速器，由一个 & 号字符，菜单项字符串中表示。However, menus often enable accelerators, denoted by an ampersand character, in the menu item string. 工具提示不支持此功能，因此默认情况下，& 只显示作为普通字符。ToolTips do not support this capability, so by default, ampersands are just displayed as normal characters. 设置属性`true`所有 & 都移除的工具提示文本。Setting the property to `true` removes all ampersands from the ToolTip text.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ Tag { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置包含由程序员提供的数据的对象，这些数据与 关联。

span.span: Gets or sets the object that contains programmer-supplied data associated with the .

value.span: 一个 ，包含有关 的数据。

span.span: An that contains data about the .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，使用属性来存储数据有相当。Typically, you use the property to store data that is closely associated with the . 例如，如果您要显示的控件，显示客户信息，你可能会存储包含中的客户的信息属性，以便可以快速访问这些数据。For example, if you are displaying a for a control that displays customer information, you might store the that contains the customer's information in the property so the data can be accessed quickly.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::ToolTipIcon ToolTipIcon { System::Windows::Forms::ToolTipIcon get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::ToolTipIcon value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值定义要在工具提示文本旁显示的图标的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that defines the type of icon to be displayed alongside the ToolTip text.
One of the enumerated values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你想要使用未定义的一个图形枚举，您必须所有者描述整个工具提示。If you want to use a graphic that is not defined by the enumeration, you must owner-draw the entire ToolTip. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ToolTipTitle { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置工具提示窗口的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets a title for the ToolTip window.
A containing the window title.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标题在窗口中显示为工具提示控件说明标准文本上方显示为粗体文本行。The title is displayed within the window as a line of bold text above the standard text of a ToolTip control description. 通常情况下，标题是仅用于区分不同类别的控件在窗体上或作为较长控件说明的介绍。Typically, titles are only used either to differentiate different categories of controls on a form or as an introduction to a fairly long control description. 标题的最大长度为 99 个字符。The maximum length of a title is 99 characters. 如果此属性包含的字符串长度然后 99 个字符，则将显示无标题。If this property contains a string longer then 99 characters, no title will be displayed.

span.span: Returns a string representation for this control.
A containing a description of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重写的版本的方法显示类名称后, 跟的值和属性。This overridden version of the method displays the class name, followed by the values of the and properties.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseAnimation { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定在显示工具提示时是否应使用动画效果。

span.span: Gets or sets a value determining whether an animation effect should be used when displaying the ToolTip.

value.span: 如果应使用窗口动画，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if window animation should be used; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Internet Explorer 5 和 Microsoft Windows XP 引入了动态的用户界面效果，如窗口淡入淡出和动画。Internet Explorer 5 and Microsoft Windows XP introduced dynamic user interface effects such as window fading and animation. 如果用户未禁用这些功能，属性可以用于为工具提示显示在这些平台上启用此功能。If the user has not disabled these capabilities, the property can be used to enable this capability for ToolTips displayed on these platforms.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseFading { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定在显示工具提示时是否应使用淡入淡出效果。

span.span: Gets or sets a value determining whether a fade effect should be used when displaying the ToolTip.

value.span: 如果应使用淡入淡出效果，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if window fading should be used; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Internet Explorer 5 和 Microsoft Windows XP 引入了动态的用户界面效果，如窗口淡入淡出和动画。Internet Explorer 5 and Microsoft Windows XP introduced dynamic user interface effects such as window fading and animation. 如果用户未禁用这些功能，属性可以用于为工具提示显示在这些平台上启用此功能。If the user has not disabled these capabilities, the property can be used to enable this capability for ToolTips displayed on these platforms.
